response.original_title: 罠に落された美人妻 吉川あいみ
response.overview: Aimi is a young wife with a plump bust, but an innocent face. Although they are not rich, they live modestly and happily with their kind husband Hiroyuki. However, due to the recent recession, Hiroyuki's salary has been reduced, and recently they have become so poor that they can't even eat properly... Hiroyuki, not wanting Aimi to suffer, has secretly borrowed money from a loan shark. However, the loan shark was run by a gangster. Kudo, the president of the loan shark, visits the couple's apartment and suggests to the frightened Aimi that "if she works as a brothel, she can pay off her debt quickly."
response.tagline: "Every day, I was forced to work as a brothel in my own home, with my husband right next to me... I provided sexual services to strange men in lewd poses, and was constantly embraced by them..."
response.title: Beautiful wife trapped in a trap - Aimi Yoshikawa
